metadata.title: Device: All QFN packages available for the device have an exposed die pad. Is it mandatory to connect it to GND, or can it be left unconnected?

sections.content:
Question:
All QFN packages available for the device have an exposed die pad. Is it mandatory to connect it to GND, or can it be left unconnected?
Answer:
On this device connecting the exposed die pad to GND is mandatory.
Suitable Products
RISC-V Voice ASSP
